title.narrative: M4P Facilitation and Management - International Climate Financing

description.narrative: This activity (M4P Facilitation and Management - International Climate Financing) is a component of Market Development in Northern Ghana reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,012,298. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Agricultural development, Agricultural services. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe. The start date is 09-08-2017 and the end date is 30-11-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - other services
Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2017 Quarter 4
